mapper.select: select ST.STORE_NO , ST.STORE_NAME , ST.STORE_CATEGORY , ST.STORE_DETAIL , ST.STORE_SCORE , (select count(LIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT from LIKE_LIST where STORE_NO = ST.STORE_NO) LIKE_COUNT , SI.PHOTO_NAME from STORE ST LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO , group_concat(case PHOTO_TYPE when 'SU1' then PHOTO_NAME end) PHOTO_NAME from STORE_IMAGE where PHOTO_TYPE='SU1' group by STORE_NO) SI ON ST.STORE_NO = SI.STORE_NO where STORE_NAME like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_CATEGORY like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_DETAIL like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') order by LIKE_COUNT DESC;
select count(*) from STORE where STORE_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_CATEGORY like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_DETAIL like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%');

select ST.STORE_NO , ST.OWN_NO , ST.STORE_NAME , ST.STORE_TEL , replace(ST.STORE_LOCATION, ' ', '+') STORE_LOCATION , ST.STORE_CATEGORY , ST.STORE_DETAIL , ST.STORE_INFO , ST.STORE_PLUS , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_ST, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_ST , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_ET, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_ET , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_BT, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_BT , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_LO, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_LO , ST.STORE_RST , date_format(timediff(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_RET, '%H%i') , STR_TO_DATE(STORE_RST, "%H%i")), '%H%i') TIEMDIFF , ST.SOTRE_CLOSE , ST.STORE_SCORE , (select count(LIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT from LIKE_LIST where STORE_NO = ST.STORE_NO) LIKE_COUNT , SI.BA1 , SI.BA2 from STORE ST LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO, group_concat(case PHOTO_TYPE when 'BA1' then PHOTO_NAME end) BA1, group_concat(case PHOTO_TYPE when 'BA2' then PHOTO_NAME end) BA2 from STORE_IMAGE where (PHOTO_TYPE='BA1' or PHOTO_TYPE='BA2') group by STORE_NO) SI ON ST.STORE_NO = SI.STORE_NO where ST.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};

select ME.MENU_NO , ME.STORE_NO , ME.MENU_NAME , ME.MENU_PRICE , ME.MENU_HIDE , ME.MENU_INFO , SI.PHOTO_NAME from MENU ME LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO , PHOTO_TYPE , PHOTO_NAME from STORE_IMAGE where PHOTO_TYPE LIKE 'ME%') SI ON (ME.STORE_NO, ME.MENU_NO) = (SI.STORE_NO, SI.PHOTO_TYPE) where ME.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};

select SE.SEAT_NO , SE.STORE_NO , SE.SEAT_NAME , SE.SEAT_USETIME , SE.SEAT_MIN , SE.SEAT_MAX , SE.SEAT_CONTENT , SE.SEAT_OC , SI.PHOTO_NAME from SEAT SE LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO, PHOTO_TYPE, PHOTO_NAME from STORE_IMAGE where PHOTO_TYPE LIKE 'SE%') SI ON (SE.STORE_NO, SE.SEAT_NO) = (SI.STORE_NO, SI.PHOTO_TYPE) where SE.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO} ORDER BY SEAT_NO;
select SEAT_NO , STORE_NO , SEAT_NAME , SEAT_USETIME , SEAT_MIN , SEAT_MAX , SEAT_CONTENT , SEAT_OC from SEAT where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO} and SEAT_NO = #{TABLE_NO};
